description:
Use the SSH File Transfer Protocol or File Transfer Protocol to import a file.

**FTP server**
When specifying the URL for connection to a FTP server use the syntax
```
ftp:://[username:password@]hostname.com/path/to/file.txt
```
username and password are optional. If you omit the `username:password@` then `anonymous` will be used for both username and password

**SFTP server**
When specifying the URL for connection to a SFTP server use the syntax
```
sftp:://username:password@hostname.com/path/to/file.txt
```
username and password are required.

input.name: url
input.description: The url of the file to be imported. e.g [s]ftp:://[username:password@]hostname.com/path/to/file.txt
